essentials:
• Oil-Free Formulas
  • Hydrating Ingredients
  • Mattifying Ingredients

    • Acne-Fighting Ingredients: If you have oily, acne-prone skin, consider serums that contain ingredients like salicylic acid or tea tree oil. These ingredients help to unclog pores, reduce inflammation, and prevent breakouts.

essentials:
• Look for Lightweight Formulas
  • Consider your main skin care concerns by having a look on below
    • Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates the skin
    • Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Helps regulate sebum production, reduces pore size
    • Salicylic Acid: Helps to exfoliate the skin,unclog pores,and reduce acne
    • Glycolic Acid/Lactic Acid:gently exfoliate the skin and improving texture
    • Vitamin C: Brightens the skin, evens out skin tone
    • Green Tea Extract: Soothes inflammation,controls oil production.
  • Avoid Heavy Oils
  • Consistency is Key
description:

Plum 10% Niacinamide Face Serum with Rice Water & Squalane| Brightens Skin , Clears Blemishes IMPROVES SKIN TEXTURE.SOOTHE SKIN, BOOSTS SKIN HYDRATION.

essentials:
• Look for serums containing retinoids or retinol .These ingredients stimulate collagen production, promote skin cell turnover.
  • Hyaluronic acid is especially beneficial for addressing dehydration-related wrinkles.
  • It also stimulates collagen synthesis, brightens the complexion, and can reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
  • Peptides are short chains of amino acids which can help improve skin firmness and reduce the appearance of wrinkles.
  • Niacinamide can also reduce the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, and hyperpigmentation, while also improving skin texture and tone.
description:
